text: "Noticed" is a song by American rapper Lil Mosey. It was released as a single on July 13, 2018. The song was produced by Royce David. The song was streamed over one million times on SoundCloud and achieved four million plays on Spotify, in one week in September 2018 in the United States. Since, it has racked up almost 200 million YouTube views, over 350 million Spotify plays and 60 million SoundCloud streams. It was named one of the five hip hop singles to watch of fall 2018 by Forbes. The track was also noted for its lyrical references to and presence of lean on the cover art and in its video. ==Composition== Forbes called the track a "rap-sung hybrid". "Noticed" also makes use of Auto-Tune on Mosey's vocals. Lyrically, Lil Mosey boasts about how much he earns and the changes in his lifestyle. ==Music video== The video was directed by Cole Bennett and features Lil Mosey showing off his "flashy lifestyle" including his jewelry and cars, as well as lying in bed next to a girl and waking up in a condo located in the mountains. ==Personnel== Credits adapted from the album's liner notes and Tidal. * Royce David – production, composition, mixing, studio personnel ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| Canada (Canadian Hot 100) | 50 |- |- ! scope="row"| Ireland (IRMA) | 67 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Hot Singles (RMNZ) | 33 |- |- ! scope="row"| Sweden Heatseeker (Sverigetopplistan) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| US Billboard Hot 100 (Billboard) | 80 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs (Billboard) | 38 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Lil Mosey songs Category:Music videos directed by Cole Bennett
title: Noticed (song)
